pr_title: Make lightning have frag angle properties

timeline.message:
Make lightning have frag angle properties

Adds `lightningCone`, which is the full angle of where the lightning direction can be, and `lightningAngle` which is the angle compared to the bullet that the center of the lightning cone is.

timeline.bodyText: This should go in the function itself for consistency. No extra variable.
timeline.author: Anuken

replies.bodyText: Is there a button for accepting suggested changes, or is it committed already?
